'WIAD' is a commercial radio station in Bethesda, Maryland, broadcasting to the
Washington, DC area on 94.7 FM. It currently broadcasts a Hot Adult Contemporary
format as "94.7 Fresh FM". It is owned by CBS Radio and has studios located in
Lanham, Maryland.
categories: Hot adult contemporary radio stations in the United States
